summary: In 1977, a girl is kidnapped and kept in a coffin-sized box. When her captors let her out, it's only to abuse her horribly. Will she ever escape?
cast: Addison Timlin|Zane Holtz|Zelda Williams|Brittany Allen|Matt Cooke|Shawn Wright|Bill Lake|Shileen Paton|Vivian Wright|Adrian Griffin|Nathaniel Burns|Kimball Farley|Rob Hartz|Sean Ryan McBride|Hugh McCrae Jr.|Jabari Overstreet|Robert Peters|Cisco Saavedra
title: Girl in the Box
